1: la phan <mistake>pa'i</mistake> gang zag <mistake>mchog /'jig</mistake> rten dpe las 'das pa <mistake>ste//shes</mistake> dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / gtso bo chos kyi <mistake>sbyin</mistake> pa'i <mistake>bdag /phyag</mistake> rgya bzhi <mistake>bo'i</mistake> don ston <mistake>pa//'gro</mistake> <mistake>ba'i</mistake> bsnyen <mistake>bkur</mistake> gnas kyi
2: <mistake>mchog /nges</mistake> 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams <mistake>kyi//don</mistake> gyi dam pa rnam dag <mistake>dpal//'jig</mistake> rten gsum gyi skal bzang <mistake>che// dpal</mistake> ldan 'byor pa kun byed <mistake>pa//'jdam</mistake> dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i <mistake>mchog/</mistake>
3: bya <mistake>bagrub</mistake> pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa bco <mistake>lna'o////mchog</mistake> sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod <mistake>'dud/ yang</mistake> dag mthar gyur khyod la <mistake>'dud//stong</mistake> nyid snying po khyod la <mistake>'dud//sangs</mistake> rgyas byang chub khyod la <mistake>'dud//</mistake>
4: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la <mistake>'dud//sangs</mistake> rgyas <mistake>'dong</mistake> la phyag 'tshal <mistake>'dud//sangs</mistake> rgyas dgyes pa khyod la <mistake>'dud//sangs</mistake> rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal <mistake>'dud//sangs</mistake> rgyas <mistake>'dum</mistake> pa <mistake>bhyod</mistake> la <mistake>'dud//sangs</mistake>
5: rgyas snang ba phyag 'tshal <mistake>'dud //sangs</mistake> rgyas gsung ba khyod la <mistake>'dud// sangs</mistake> rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal <mistake>'dud// dngos</mistake> med las <mistake>byung</mistake> khyod la <mistake>'dud// sangs</mistake> rgyas <mistake>'byund</mistake> ba khyod la <mistake>'dud //nam</mistake> <mistake>mkha'</mistake>
6: las byung khyod la <mistake>'dud//ye</mistake> shes las byung khyod la <mistake>'dud//sgyu</mistake> 'phrul dra <mistake>bkhyod</mistake> la <mistake>'dung//sangs</mistake> rgyas gar mdzad khyod la <mistake>'dud/thams</mistake> <mistake>cang</mistake> thams cad khyod la <mistake>'dud//ye</mistake> shes sku khyod la <mistake>'dung</mistake> do // zhes pa
7: de bzhin gshegs pa <mistake>lnga'i</mistake> ye shes kyi bstod pa tshigs su <mistake>bcid</mistake> pa <mistake>lnga'o///sag</mistake> na rdo rje rdo rje <mistake>'chang/'di</mistake> ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi <mistake>shu</mistake> <mistake>dang/ de</mistake> <mistake>bzhini</mistake> gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
8: sku <mistake>dang/'jdam</mistake> dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa <mistake>yongs</mistake> su dag pa'i <mistake>mtshan</mistake> yang dag par brjod <mistake>pa'o//khyod</mistake> kyi <mistake>zla</mistake> na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dang <mistake>ba</mistake> dang mgu ba chen po yang dag par bskyed
